data.text: @JulesDiner We’re in Italy. Lots of things require proof of vaccination. EU has digital “green pass.” We’re showing our physical copies.

@NotoriousTIB @sarahjoykillam She being the ten year old daughter who picked Venice for her international trip (ten years old bday gift). A lot of walking and she is more tired than she admits but she is excited and in good spirits.
@sarahjoykillam That’s our day trip tomorrow! We only arrive last night around 22:30 local time. So getting out in the sun was the goal today.

@NotoriousTIB @sarahjoykillam She bought “a brief history of Venice” in Italian. She’s been learning. Tried a couple new phrases out today. Hopefully will be encouraged to try more as the week goes on.
@JoshuaTorrey Lovely!! Have fun! If you haven’t yet, going to Murano & Burano by water taxi (and watching the glass blowing when there) was one of my favorite things to do when visiting.
@sarahjoykillam @JoshuaTorrey aqua Alta!!!! Yes! I love that place.
@sarahjoykillam Yes. We’re in Venice for the next ten days. Maybe a day trip our two out of city depending on how much we see early on. We saw a lot today.
